languages.text: {n}Над толпой начинает подниматься смех — публика оценила вашу пускай и милосердную, но все же шпильку в адрес насмешника. Скоморох издает злобный звук — и устремляется прочь под гогот окружающих.{/n}
{n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Над толпой начинает подниматься смех — публика оценила вашу пускай и милосердную, но все же шпильку в адрес насмешника. Скоморох издает злобный звук — и устремляется прочь под гогот окружающих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Laughter starts bubbling in the crowd, the audience has appreciated your gracious yet mocking quip. The jester makes an angry sound and flees to the cackling of passers-by.{/n}
{n}Laughter starts bubbling in the crowd, the audience has appreciated your gracious yet mocking quip. The jester makes an angry sound and flees to the cackling of passers-by.{/n}
{n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd. The audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking quip. The jester makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}

{n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}
{n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}人群中爆发出阵阵大笑，围观的民众很喜欢你既亲切、又充满嘲讽意味的评论。小丑愤怒地尖叫一声，随后逃之夭夭，周围的人发出了阵阵嗤笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群中爆发出阵阵大笑，围观的民众很喜欢你既亲切、又充满嘲讽意味的评论。小丑愤怒地尖叫一声，随后逃之夭夭，周围的人发出了阵阵嗤笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La multitud ríe a carcajadas al oír tu refinado aunque socarrón comentario. El bufón resopla indignado y huye del lugar entre las risotadas de los presentes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalıktan kahkahalar yükseliyor. Seyirciler, zarif ama alaycı yorumunu takdir ediyor. Soytarı ise öfkeli bir ses çıkarıp görgü tanıklarının kıkırdamaları eşliğinde kaçıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆から笑いが起きる―彼らはあなたの優美だが嘲るような言葉を理解する。道化は怒ったような声を出すと野次馬の騒ぎの中に逃走する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆から笑いが起きる―彼らはあなたの優美だが嘲るような言葉を理解する。道化は怒ったような声を出すと野次馬の騒ぎの中に逃走する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des rires s'élèvent de la foule, preuve que la saillie méprisante assénée sous couvert de votre magnanimité a fait mouche. Le bouffon pousse un grognement rageur avant de prendre la fuite sous les ricanements des spectateurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gelächter kommt in der Menge auf. Das Publikum weiß deine gnädige und doch spöttische Bemerkung zu schätzen. Der Narr stößt ein zorniges Geräusch aus und flieht unter dem Lachen der Umstehenden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Laughter bubbles up from the crowd — the audience appreciates your gracious yet mocking remark. The fool makes an angry sound and flees, to the cackling of bystanders.{/n}
